title: Watch: Nautic – Fresh Eyes (Live At Boiler Room)
body:
Weekends so often spread into weekdays don’t they? This goes to some lengths to explain our absence yesterday.

We start today however with a Boiler Room recording of CitR faves **[Nautic](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18576-video-nautic-fresh-eyes/ "Video: Nautic – Fresh Eyes")** tearing it up at the Young Turks take over last week. It’s a spine tingling rendition of their debut single, [_Fresh Eyes_.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18576-video-nautic-fresh-eyes/ "Video: Nautic – Fresh Eyes") Plus our boy **[Slime](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16942-video-slime-anni/ "Video: Slime – Anni")** is centre shot. What’s not to love?
